Name: Missile Launch
Text: Draw 3 cards. If you are playing on a KAMINO map, draw 4 cards instead.

Name: Rocket Retreat
Text: After attacking, you may move Jango to any empty space.

Name: Wrist Cable
Text: Deal 2 damage to a character that Jango can attack. The controlling player gets 1 less action on their next turn.

Name: Fire Up the Jetpack
Text: You may move Jango to any empty space. Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Sniper Shot
Text: *If Zam damages an enemy character with this card, the attack value is 6 instead of 3.

Name: Assassination
Text: After attacking, you may move Zam to any empty space.

Name: Shape Match
Text: If the opponent played a card, the attack and defend values of this card are equal to those of the opponent's card.

Name: Ally Shape
Text: Zam cannot be targeted by enemy attacks until her next attack.

Name: Force Control
Text: After attacking, move Obi-Wan and the defending character up to 3 spaces each.

Name: The High Ground
Text: After attacking, you may move Obi-Wan up to 6 spaces.

Name: I Don't Think So
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Balance
Text: All players discard their hands. Each player draws 3 new cards.

Name: Force Healing
Text: Any character adjacent to Obi-Wan recovers 2 damage.

Name: Jedi Mind Trick
Text: Take any card from your discard pile and put that card in your hand.

Name: Force Speed
Text: Move Obi-Wan up to 6 spaces, then draw a card.

Name: Justice
Text: *If Leia has been destroyed, the attack value of this card is 10.

Name: Justice
Text: *If an ally has been destroyed, the attack value of this card is 10.

Name: I Will Not Fight You
Text: Choose an opponent and reveal your hands to each other. Both of you must discard all cards with an attack value greater than 1.

Name: Children of the Force
Text: Move Luke and Leia up to 6 spaces each. Draw 2 cards.

Name: There is Another
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Luke's in Trouble
Text: If Leia is adjacent to Luke, he recovers 4 damage. If Luke has been destroyed, Leia recovers 4 damage.

Name: Size Matters Not
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Rebound
Text: Yoda receives no damage from the attack. Instead, the attacker receives damage equal to the attack value on the opponent's card

Name: Serenity
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Lift
Text: Turn any character adjacent to Yoda on its side. This character cannot move, attack, or defend until any player discards 3 cards to stand it back up.

Name: Force Push
Text: Move any character adjacent to Yoda to any empty space. That character receives 3 damage.

Name: Insight
Text: Look at any opponent's hand, then choose one of their cards to discard.

Name: Force Lightning
Text: Choose any character. That character receives 3 damage. The controlling player must discard a card at random.

Name: Let Go Of Your Hatred
Text: Choose an opponent. That opponent discards 2 cards of their choice.

Name: You Will Die
Text: Choose an opponent to reveal their hand. For every 2 cards in their hand, they must choose and discard a card.

Name: Meditation
Text: Choose an opponent. They cannot draw cards their next turn. Palpatine recovers 4 damage.

Name: Future Foreseen
Text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one in your hand and place the rest back on top of your deck in any order.

Name: Masterful Fighting
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Battlemind
Text: *The attack and defense values of this card are equal to the number of cards in your hand after this card is played.

Name: Wisdom
Text: Move Mace up to 5 spaces, then draw a card.

Name: Whirlwind Attack
Text: Mace does 4 damage to all opponent characters he can attack.

Name: Gambler's Luck
Text: *If Han does damage with this attack, choose an opponent to discard a card at random.

Name: Heroic Retreat
Text: After attacking, you may move Han up to 5 spaces.

Name: Never Tell Me The Odds
Text: Han does 3 damage to all opponent characters he can attack. You may then shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

Name: Bowcaster
Text: Draw a card.

Name: It's Not Wise
Text: Move any character adjacent to Chewbacca up to 6 spaces. That character receives 3 damage.

Name: Wookiee Endurance
Text: Chewbacca recovers 3 damage. Move Chewbacca up to 5 spaces.

Name: Wookiee Instincts
Text: Search your deck for the Bowcaster card. If it is in your deck, place it in your hand. Reshuffle your deck.

Name: You Disappoint Me
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Force Push
Text: Move any character adjacent to Dooku to any empty space. That character receives 1 damage.

Name: Give Orders
Text: Move Dooku and both Super Battle Droids up to 4 spaces each.

Name: Sith Lightning
Text: Choose an opponent to discard 2 cards at random.

Name: Twice the Pride
Text: Draw 3 cards.

Name: All Too Easy
Text: *If this card is not blocked, the target takes 20 damage instead of 7.

Name: Dark Side Drain
Text: If Vader does damage with this card, he recovers the amount of damage dealt.

Name: Throw Debris
Text: Choose any character. That character receives 4 damage.

Name: Wrath
Text: Choose an opponent. Each of their characters receives 2 damage.

Name: Choke
Text: Choose any minor character. That character receives 6 damage.

Name: Your Skills Are Not Complete
Text: Choose any opponent. They must reveal their hand and discard all Special cards.

Name: Sith Speed
Text: Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Super Sith Speed
Text: Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Athletic Surge
Text: After attacking, move Darth Maul up to 6 spaces.

Name: Martial Defense
Text: Draw a card.

Name: Blinding Surge
Text: *After taking damage from the attack, Darth Maul does 3 damage to the attacker.

Name: Kyber Dart
Text: *If this attack destroys the target, draw 3 cards.

Name: Deadly Aim
Text: Draw 2 cards.

Name: Rocket Retreat
Text: After attacking, you may move Boba Fett to any empty space.

Name: Wrist Cable
Text: Deal 2 damage to a character that Boba Fett can attack. The controlling player gets 1 less action on their next turn.

Name: Missile Blast
Text: Deal 4 damage to a character that Boba Fett can attack. All characters adjacent to that character also receive 4 damage.

Name: Desperate Shot
Text: *If you do not destroy the defending character with this card, destroy Greedo.

Name: Sudden Arrival
Text: Move Greedo adjacent to any character. Then Greedo does 1 damage to all characters he can attack. Playing this card does not count as an action.

Name: Anger
Text: After attacking, discard every card in your hand except one card.

Name: Counterattack
Text: Anakin receives no damage from the attack. Instead, the attacker receives 1 damage.

Name: Wrath
Text: You may move Anakin adjacent to any minor character. That character receives 7 damage.

Name: Calm
Text: Move Anakin up to 8 spaces. If this was the last card in your hand, draw up to 5 cards.

Name: Precise Shot
Text: After attacking, you may discard a card to draw a card.

Name: Aggressive Negotiations
Text: After attacking, move Padmé up to 6 spaces.

Name: Protection
Text: If Anakin is alive, Padmé recovers 4 damage. If Anakin has been destroyed, Padmé recovers 2 damage.
